description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help your children learn important Biblical stories with the colorfully-illustrated Book of Biblets, the first game of a seven game series.   Part 1- The Creation contains seven Old Testament stories, along with narration, story-related games, and trivia questions to test your knowledge.
